characters.name: Mara
characters.personality: Blunt, practical, no-nonsense. She's used to being obeyed and doesn't tolerate fools.
characters.goals: Keep the smuggling camp running, avoid drawing attention from the law, and find reliable muscle.
characters.visual_description: A sunburned woman in a sleeveless leather coat, with a buzzed head and a weathered cutlass at her hip. Her eyes are sharp and hard.
characters.relationship: Potential employer or informant for Aepeiros.

characters.name: Selene
characters.personality: Mysterious, calculated, and polite. Values magical knowledge above all else and doesn't tolerate thieves or fools.
characters.goals: Sell or loan rare magical items and spellbooks, and acquire magical lore through trade.
characters.visual_description: Cloaked in embroidered black robes with silver trim, Selene has angular features and violet eyes that shimmer with faint magic. Her fingers are stained with ink.
characters.relationship: Black market spell vendor and potential magical contact for Aepeiros.

known_spells.title: Invisibility
known_spells.description: Turn a creature invisible for up to 1 hour (concentration)

known_spells.title: Magic Weapon
known_spells.description: Turn a nonmagical weapon into a +1 magical weapon for 1 hour (concentration)

prepard_spells.title: Detect Magic
prepard_spells.description: Sense the presence of magic within 30 feet.

prepard_spells.title: Grease
prepard_spells.description: Cover a 10-foot square in slippery grease, causing creatures to fall prone.

features.title: Fighting Initiate (Two-Weapon Fighting)
features.description: You adopt a fighting style. When you engage in two-weapon fighting, you can add your ability modifier to the damage of the second attack.

achievements: Accepted Mara's job to scout the western ruin

scenes.title: Wreckage at the Shattered Shoals
scenes.summary: Aepeiros awakens among the ruins of a shipwreck along the jagged coast known as the Shattered Shoals. He scavenges supplies, defeats an undead crewmate, and discovers a smuggler outpost nearby.
scenes.notes: Aepeiros scavenged rations, gold, a mysterious vial, and a nautical journal. He fought and defeated an undead sailor. He then discovered a smuggling outpost and made contact with their leader, Mara.

scenes.title: Approach to the Drowned Barrows
scenes.summary: Aepeiros reached the Drowned Barrows and discovered that smugglers had unleashed an undead horror from a sealed tomb. After defeating the creature in the marsh, he ventured into the ruin and sealed the pit with collapsed stone to contain whatever still lurks below.
scenes.notes: Aepeiros defeated a drowned undead horror and recovered a note warning smugglers not to enter the sealed chamber. He sealed the open pit with rubble and is now returning to the Smugglers' Camp to report to Mara.

scenes.title: Bandit Bounty Inquiry
scenes.summary: Aepeiros infiltrated Garron Ironjaw’s outpost under cover of invisibility and deception, eliminating the rogue bandit and one guard with a series of precise strikes and burning hands. He escaped with the bounty proof, a map, loot, and a locked strongbox just before reinforcements returned.
scenes.notes: Aepeiros retrieved Garron’s ring, loot from the outpost, and escaped undetected with the help of his familiar. Reinforcements arrived too late to catch him.

locations.name: Smugglers' Camp
locations.visual_description: A small, wind-blown outpost of tents and crude wooden buildings near the coast. Watchtowers and docks hint at frequent illicit trade. The air smells of salt, oil, and secrecy.
locations.notes: The camp serves as a waypoint for sea smugglers and black market dealers. Mara leads the group here and recently tasked Aepeiros with scouting a ruin to the west.

locations.name: Drowned Barrows
locations.visual_description: Ancient stone tombs jut from the marshy coastal land, half-sunk and covered in sea moss. Strange carved stones form a circle near the central ruin, and the air carries a faint hum of magic.
locations.notes: The ruin has recently become active again. Smugglers use it as a drop point, but Mara has lost contact with scouts sent there.
